channel.title: Info3 - Labs and Exercises on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen
channel.description: Recent content in Info3 - Labs and Exercises on Prof. Dr. Barne Kleinen

item.title: Exercise 01 - Lab Startup
item.description: Nerd Workplace. Foto by slworking2 This Startup Lab is about installing the tools you need for Python Programming and getting some (more) hands-on experience with git, so start with that. If bored, move on to try python. Which Computer to use? In my experience, all Students prefer to use their own computers, which is possible as all Software we’ll use and need is free to use (at least for Students).

item.title: Exercise 02 - Learning Python
item.description: As always, you need to prepare a report together and each hand in this same report in moodle. Part 1: Python Learning with Unit Tests Continue the collaborative work on the Python Learning Repository: https://github.com/htw-imi-info3/python-learning. ** note that you need write permissions for the repository! I’ll add everyone to the team on github in the labs. ** This part can be done together, but each person must have their own topic/file and each one must commit a new file to the repo and review two other files.
